content.question: Based on the image, which of the following conclusions can best be drawn to describe the conditions in the Long Island Sound?

choices.label: The sound has high levels of dissolved oxygen as a result of storm water runoff from urban areas.
The sound has high levels of phosphorus and nitrogen from an increase in the number of producers.
The sound has large numbers of phytoplankton blooms that are decomposing and consumed by respiring bacteria.
The sound has high numbers of respiring fish populations and very low turbidity.

content.answer: The sound has large numbers of phytoplankton blooms that are decomposing and consumed by respiring bacteria.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how environmental concepts and processes represented visually relate to broader environmental issues.
